text: Vladimir Markin (; 23 November 1956 â€“ 12 October 2021) was a Russian journalist and politician. He worked for the Investigative Committee of Russia from 2011 to 2016. He was First Deputy Chairman of RusHydro from 2016 to 2019. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian journalists Category:Russian politicians Category:Russian businesspeople Category:People from Chelyabinsk Oblast
